tool.name: Scater Filter
tool.description: cells and genes based on pre-calculated stats and QC metrics
tool.command: scater-filter.R -i '${R_scater_qc}' -o '$R_scater_filtered' #if $cell_parameters #set cell_pars = ','.join([str($p['name']) for $p in $cell_parameters]) -s '${cell_pars}' #set cell_mins = ','.join([str($p['min']) for $p in $cell_parameters]) -l '${cell_mins}' #set cell_maxs = ','.join([str($p['max']) for $p in $cell_parameters]) -j '${cell_maxs}' #end if #if $feature_parameters #set ft_pars = ','.join([str($p['name']) for $p in $feature_parameters]) -t '${ft_pars}' #set ft_mins = ','.join([str($p['min']) for $p in $feature_parameters]) -m '${ft_mins}' #set ft_maxs = ','.join([str($p['max']) for $p in $feature_parameters]) -n '${ft_maxs}' #end if #if $cells_use: -c '$cells_use' #end if #if $cells_discard: -C '$cells_discard' #end if #if $features_use: -f '$features_use' #end if #if $output_selected_cells: -v '$selected_cells' #end if #if $output_selected_features: -v '$selected_featuers' #end if

param.name: R_scater_qc
param.help: A serialized SingleCellExperiment object file in RDS format.

param.name: name
param.label: Name of the parameter to filter on

param.name: name
param.label: Name of the parameter to filter on

param.name: cells_use
param.label: List of cells to include (optional)
param.help: Text file with one cell per line providing cell names to use as a subset.

param.name: cells_discard
param.label: List of cells to exclude (optional)
param.help: Text file with one cell per line providing cell names to discard as a subset.

param.name: features_use
param.label: List of features to include (optional)
param.help: Text file with one features per line providing feature names to use as a subset.
